entry.title: Wolf Transformation
entry.summary:
Author: NorthLiang37

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,062Chapters: 11/17Kudos: 75

Summary: Nightwing transformed into a wolf.‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî"I suppose this is indeed better than staying up all night," Alfred murmured with a soft sigh. "See you in the morning, boys."Jason drifted in and out of consciousness, hovering between night and day, completely unaware of what had just happened. He turned his head, burying his face in the relatively soft wolf fur, muttering incoherent dreams while clutching the black wolf's foreleg tightly.Sleep, Dick thought. I'll stay here until the end of the world.Even then, he imagined he would still hear his heartbeat pounding against the moon like a drum, synchronized with Jason's. The distance between them would remain this close, even as the vast chaos around them continued to expand endlessly.In the end, love lingered, and all the stories melted into the wind under the scorching sun.

entry.title: performing, or living
entry.summary:
Author: chasm_side

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,197Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 143

Summary: "Everyone tells themselves little stories about who they are," she told him. "Stories about why they do what they do, why they want what they want. And that's fine‚Äîtelling a story isn't the same as telling a lie, you know?" "Sure," Dick agreed. "It only gets fucked up when you start thinking your story is the only story worth believing," Jay said. "That you've got some kind of monopoly on truth, that you're the only person who gets to tell other people what's really real. So‚Ä¶ if you let me have my little stories, I'll let you have yours. If you need to believe in Batman, if you need Bruce to be a good father, if you need to roll around in your shame about not being honest with Daddy about all the awesome sex you're having with the most problematic of Daddy's problem children‚ÄîI mean, sure, whatever gets you off, right?" Dick Grayson navigates the line between fantasy and reality, tries to be a better man, has increasingly kinky sex with his pseudo-sister, and refuses to have a crisis about any of it. Jay's taking everything in stride, so why shouldn't Dick learn to accept a little volatility in his civilian life? It's only as Nightwing that he has to care about control.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 383,286Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 1,037

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.
